description: Detach a volume from a host or host group.

host_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the host group to be detached from this volume. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

host_id.description: Unique identifier of the host to be detached from this volume. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

id.description: Unique identifier of volume to detach.
